subject: Re: [junit] Testing Complete Applications and Applets
msgSnippet: ... you may wish to read http://webtest.canoo.com/webtest/manual/whitepaper.html thanks ... ray tayek http://home.attbi.com/~rtayek/ actively seeking
messageBody:
At 12:18 PM 3/21/02 +0000, you wrote:
>In additional to performing unit testing, I need to test entire applications
>with main() and applets with init(). [Background info: I am working on a
>java software development tool] I need to compare the text output
>(system.out.writeln) of the complete application/applet against expected
>output. Is there someway I could do this?

you may wish to read http://webtest.canoo.com/webtest/manual/whitepaper.html

thanks
